Product Info for Benchmade Mini-Griptilian Folding Knife w/ 6.78" OAL

Benchmade 556 Mini-Griptilian Folding Knife is a tiny little pocket knife that packs a big punch. The Benchmade knife sports a 154CM stainless steel blade that's just under three inches long, a tenth of an inch thick, and built with a power-improving modified drop point tip. What's more, the knife can be quickly opened and closed with Benchmade's patented AXIS locking mechanism, which uses an ambidextrous thumb stud opener to quickly deploy the blade. The Bench Made 556 Mini-Griptilian Stainless Steel Folder Knife gives you superior control over the blade with an ergonomic, textured handle made from Valox, complete with 420J stainless steel liners for added strength. A reversible steel pocket clip on the knife allows you to carry this small-frame blade anywhere you'll need it, which really comes in handy. Get a grip on your compact pocket knife with the Benchmade 556 Mini-Griptilian Ambidextrous Open Knife.

Specifications for Bench-Made Mini Griptilian AXIS Lock Folding Knife:

Knife Type: Folding
Blade Length: 2.91"
Blade Thickness: 0.10"
Handle Thickness: 0.51"
Blade Material: 154CM stainless steel
Blade Hardness: 58-60 HRC
Blade Tip: Modified drop point
Weight: 2.56 oz
Locking Mechanism: AXIS, ambidextrous thumb studs
Overall Length: 6.78"
Closed Length: 3.87"
Handle Material: Valox
made in specialized factories: Yes

Features of Benchmade Mini Griptilian Drop Point Folder Knife:

  • Compact and effective pocket knife for a multitude of uses by Benchmade and Pardue Design
  • Modified drop point blade made from 154CM stainless steel
  • AXIS locking mechanism for safe blade storage when not in use
  • Blade deploys with ambidextrous thumb studs
  • Tough Valox handle with 420J stainless steel bolsters
  • Reversible steel pocket clip
  • Made in specialized factories

Package Contents:

  • Benchmade 556 Mini-Griptilian Folding Knife

Customer Reviews
Helpful Positive Review Great pocket knife by bsmith4000, January 12, 2017
I wanted a knife to carry in my pocket which was less than 3". This knife fit the bill perfectly. Excellent quality as you would expect from Benchmade. This is my 5th Benchmade knife and they have all been high quality knives.
1/1 found this helpful
Most Recent Reviews Captain, Williamson County Sheriff's Office by fred, July 11, 2016
I needed a small, well-made pocket knife for every day carry, and the Benchmade Mini is just the ticket. It is comfortable to carry and just the right size clipped to the inside of my pocket. It maintains a sharp edge and is a quality knife. Regards...
Read More...
Most Recent Reviews Great Everyday Carry Knife by YooperSteve, March 16, 2016
The knife shipped extremely fast from Optics Planet and it exceeds all expectations. Very sharp out of the box and a perfect size for EDC use. Also, the black blade is a great contrast against the tan handle; making for a "sharp" looking knife as w...
Read More...
Most Recent Reviews great small pocket knife by EDC, October 21, 2015
My first Benchmade product. Very sturdy and high quality EDC knife as Benchmade reputation. Locking mechanism provides fast and smooth opening. Well designed shape gives secure and firm grip. Highly recommend it to anyone.
Most Recent Reviews Excellent knife & excellent service by Duke, August 31, 2015
